import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import Alert from '@mui/material/Alert'; import Stack from '@mui/material/Stack'; import axios from 'axios'; function AdminLogin() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); let navigate = useNavigate(); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const [success, setSuccess] = useState(''); const [loginStatus, setLoginStatus] = useState(""); const [auth, setAuth] =useState(false); const [name, setName] = useState("") const [message, setMessage] = useState('') axios.default.withCredentials = true; useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:8086') .then(res=> { if(res.data.Status === "Success"){ setAuth(true) window.location.href = '/feed'; } else { setMessage(res.data.Message) } }) }, []) axios.defaults.withCredentials = true; const handleLogin = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (email === '' || password === '') { setError('Email and password are required.'); setIsLoading(false); } else { setIsLoading(true); axios .post('http://localhost:8086/admin/login', { email: email, password: password, }) .then((response) => { if (response.data.Status !== 'Success') { // Handling incorrect email or password setError(response.data.message); setIsLoading(false); } else { // Successful login setSuccess('Welcome back!'); setError(null); setEmail(''); setPassword(''); setIsLoading(false); let path = '/admin'; navigate(path); } }) .catch((error) => { setError('An error occurred while logging in.'); setIsLoading(false); }); } }; const toRegister=()=>{ let path = `/register`; navigate(path); } const forgotPassword=()=>{ let path = `/forgot-password`; navigate(path); } return ( <>

setEmail(ev.target.value)} placeholder="username@gmail.com" />

) } export default AdminLogin
